response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds significant value to both of us. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors and enhance your business significantly.

Considering its immense worth to you, I propose a transaction price of $1,200,000. This figure represents a fair compromise between its market value and its importance to you, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial outcome.

Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations, and we can proceed with the details of the transaction. I am confident that together, we can make this valuable asset a part of your successful venture.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
